Author: juwo
Content: I agree. Is the solution to rewrite it in Apollo Flash?\n(There may be the same problems that Java Web Start has had).

Author: amichail
Content:
One could argue that children are less likely to obey their parents and when they grow older less likely to want a boss of any sort.

This might even explain the sorts of places where you find startup hubs in the US.

Author: juwo
Content: As soon as juwo can control Flash player, I plan to create a Best Of Youtube website, where people can juwo videos on youtube, and share them. Please look at the Heather's blog American Idol demo.

Author: amichail
Title: Is entrepreneurship more common today because rejection of authority is more common now?
